𓏠 Gamen Ge-Menge Numbers

𓏠 𓈖 𓃒 ≈ 󱁕 𔒁 𔑾 miⁿ

𓄣 -men noun-forming suffix ⇔ manner ment 𒈨𒌍 mes e.g. bitumen

𒉌 •nait < •mat •mãt < #mindê in 𒂍𒉌𒂶 por.mat.gara > formatgeria √ferment ☑

𒌑𒈠𒄠 ú-ma-am beast

𓉧 mason maison 𓉔 ⋍ mansion manzil@AR 𓉧 ⲙⲟⲛⲏ < ⲙⲁ ⲛⲟⲩⲱϩ > מָעוֹן ma'ón
𓉧 ⲙⲁⲛ- 𓅓 gerund locative, e.g. monastry
𓉧 ⲙⲁⲛⲥⲱⲛϩ m. place of binding, prison ϫⲓⲛⲥⲱⲛϩ m. binding, ⲥⲟⲛϩ⳼ ↔ ⲥⲱⲛϩ to bind

𓅱 𓀀 mon mine mein

𓋉 𓊃 sym+mend = zusammen

𒃞 MEN •gmen g+m+en

min / men 门門 dual

𒈫 MIN 门 門 menge 2

𒌋𒌋 man = king
